org.vanilladb.core.storage.tx.recovery

Interface LogRecord

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IndexDeleteEndRecord, IndexInsertEndRecord, IndexPageDeleteClr, IndexPageDeleteRecord, IndexPageInsertClr, IndexPageInsertRecord, LogicalAbortRecord, LogicalStartRecord, RecordFileDeleteEndRecord, RecordFileInsertEndRecord, SetValueClr

    public interface LogRecord
    The interface to be implemented by each type of log record.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Constant> buildRecord()
      Build the constants for the physical log record and return them as a list.
      LogSeqNum getLSN()
      Returns the log sequence number of this log record.
      int op()
      Returns IDs used to distinguish different logged operations.
      void redo(Transaction tx)
      Redoes the operation encoded by this log record.
      long txNumber()
      Returns the transaction id stored with the log record.
      void undo(Transaction tx)
      Undoes the operation encoded by this log record.
      LogSeqNum writeToLog()
      Writes the record to the log and returns its LSN.

      • logMgr

        static final LogMgr logMgr

    • Method Detail

      • buildRecord

        List<Constant> buildRecord()
        Build the constants for the physical log record and return them as a list.
        Returns:
        a list containing the constants for a log record

      • writeToLog

        LogSeqNum writeToLog()
        Writes the record to the log and returns its LSN.
        Returns:
        the LSN of the record in the log

      • op

        int op()
        Returns IDs used to distinguish different logged operations. Depending on the type of value being set, the operation ID of the SetValueRecord equals to the corresponding SQL type. Thus all other operations cannot have IDs equal to the values defined in Types.
        Returns:
        the operation ID

      • txNumber

        long txNumber()
        Returns the transaction id stored with the log record.
        Returns:
        the log record's transaction id

      • getLSN

        LogSeqNum getLSN()
        Returns the log sequence number of this log record.
        Returns:
        the LSN

      • undo

        void undo(Transaction tx)
        Undoes the operation encoded by this log record.
        Parameters:
        tx - the transaction that is performing the undo.

      • redo

        void redo(Transaction tx)
        Redoes the operation encoded by this log record.
        Parameters:
        tx - the transaction that is performing the redo.
